comment: The vertex degree function on graphs of finite size is a function from vertices to nonnegative integers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Mar-2015.) (Revised by Alexander van der Vekens, 20-Dec-2017.) (Revised by AV, 11-Dec-2020.)
